Docs.typeparam: The type that describes what 'source' columns are consumed from the input .
The type that describes what new columns are added by this transform.
Docs.summary: This transform generates additional columns to the provided . It doesn't change the number of rows, and can be seen as a result of application of the user's function to every row of the input data.
